description: Installation and display of five advertising hoardings measuring (i) 2.4m high by 14m wide (ii) 2.4m high by 20.5m wide (iii) 2.4m high by 6m wide (iv) 2.4m high by 17.5m wide (vi) 2.4m high by 3.0m wide (vii) 2.4m high by 13.2m wide all situated at ground floor level.
